attributes.comment:
Dear USCIS:
I have just learned of your propose increase in fee services. Our family is presently
in the process of adopting our daughter from China. Due to the increasing waiting
time, it is very probable that we will have to resubmit to USCIS since all our
paperwork will expire. Adoption is a personal journey that every family makes
requiring much emotional and financial sacrifices. It has been difficult enough
covering all the fees required and yet because of the short time (12 month) of the I-
600 and I-600A forms we will be paying it in the end twice. Please be considerate
for the families that have chosen to do a good thing in giving hope and life to an
orphan. Please do not burden us with increased fees and find another way to
adjust your budget. I sincerely hope and pray that you will reconsider and do not
pass the proposed increase. Remember the adoptive families and the children
they are bringing home.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Ana Mendez
